name: Shadow of the past (DEMO)
description:
Shadow of the past is an action - adventure RPG game.

Lexia, Mark, Lance, Kinchi and Karla reunite again after along time, followed
by something unexpected.

Discover the shadow world and investigate the past in order to solve problems   in the future.
But problems always occur...
       


This is a demo. The full game is still in development.
